title: Both the rates are considered as mentioned in applicable A
clause_text: Both the rates are considered as mentioned in applicable A.S.R. (Annual Statement of Rates) for the scheme plot on the date of granting Commencement Certificate (C.C.) to the project. In difficult or dense areas wherein the existing density either in-situ or after clubbing or after relocation-rehabilitation, as the case may be, is more than 650 T/Ha. & up to 850 T/Ha.,
section: REGULATIONS RELATING TO REHABILITATION AND FREE SALE COMPONENTS â€“
